name: Demon's Deal: Part 1
description:
Demon's Deal: Part 1 Kill werewolves and one-eyed bats as the young monster hunter Victor Morgan.

     You play as Victor Morgan, a 16 year old boy who reluctantly makes a deal with a demon to save his town against an attack from a horde of monsters..

     You can use your crossbow or your sword to slay monsters in real time. You are also given the power to slow down time at your will.

     This game has 3 levels and a boss fight at the end. The whole game takes about 15 minutes to complete.  

     This game was developed from start to finish in two and a half weeks by two students. We plan to further explore this world with Demon's Deal: Part 2, which will be the final installment.  

Thank you for playing!

known bugs:

In Level 2, after speaking with demon, you have to "Jump" once before speaking with Timmy or the cutscene gets stuck.
